room_title: Escape room "Escape from Happy Acres" by Escape Room Adventures WNY in Buffalo
review: The best place to go for escape rooms. The eight of us went and escaped from Happy Acres with about six minutes to spare!

room_title: Escape room "Escape from Happy Acres" by Escape Room Adventures WNY in Buffalo
review: Our group of 7 (4 adults and 3 teens) escaped the "From Happy Acres" room last night. This was our first escape room and we had a blast! The owner is very personable and made the whole experience so much fun for us. Highly recommend to all ages.

room_title: Escape room "Escape from Happy Acres" by Escape Room Adventures WNY in Buffalo
review: Last night my partner and I did the Happy Acres room and it was hands down the best escape experience ever. We both have done over 10 room escapes in NYC but this place.....blew us away! There is NO other place that can or will ever compare to Escape Room Adventure.
